nodes.text: A Force familiar was an animal that could share a bond with its owner in the Force. Vjun fox Miss Vix was a Force familiar for Viscountess Whirry Malreaux on the Force-steeped Outer Rim world of Vjun in 19 BBY, on which the connection with a familiar was considered an art. She stayed close to her mistress, often following her around Château Malreaux, and died along with the Countess following Dooku's occupation of the Château during the Clone Wars.
The concept of a Force familiar made its first appearance in the 2004 novel Yoda: Dark Rendezvous by Sean Stewart.
